item.title: Report X-2023090168
item.description:
Report X-2023090168

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-04T06:23:51+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED SIX POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING SALMON. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS INSIDE TO BOX. OUTER BOX IS MARKED KEEP FROZEN, PERISHABLE, FROZEN SEAFOOD WITH UP PREPRINTED ORIENTATION ARROWS. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
